QuestData.Title: Free Our Brothers and Sisters
QuestData.Description: These Thunderlord curs use coward's weapons like nets and chains.$B$BMany of our villagers and wolf-brothers and sisters have been trapped.$B$BIf you free them, they will fight at your side with honor.$B$BWe must quell this attack with haste so I may return to Bladespire Citadel and continue my preparations.
QuestData.LogDescription: Free $1oa Frost Wolves or Wor'gol Villagers.
QuestData.RewardText: The Frostwolf clan cannot be held like beasts.$B$BYou fight with honor, $n.
